name: Night Whisperer
description:
GTMK2021 Submission

Story:

You're tired of the residents in the neighborhood and must work out how to break their connections and trust, encouraging them to leave.

You must go around the neighborhood collecting items and finding ways to use them to effect the characters around you. Discover the combinations that lead towards the ruin of friendship and love!

You must be careful though and sneak around, as you may be spotted or wake the occupants. Watch your every move and be on alert.

                              

 

Controls:

Movement:

  • Use the mouse to move around, point and click where you want to go!
  • The further your mouse, the faster you'll travel!
  • The closer your mouse, the slower you'll travel!
  • Moving slow will allow you to sneak!

Interacting:

  • Click on objects to interact with them!
  • Keep an eye out for the cursor changing!
